name: Skindred
description: '''Skindred''' is a Welsh band that fuses [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] with other genres, most notably [[reggae]]. Formed in [[Newport, Wales|Newport]] in 1998, they are well known for their energetic and involving live performances and have won several awards including "Best Live Band" at the 2011 UK [[Metal Hammer]] Golden Gods Awards  and the "Devotion Award" at the 2011 [[Kerrang! Awards]].
